response.body:
{
    "success": "ok",
    "data": {
        "orders": [
            {
                "id": 342,
                "client_id": 2,
                "services_id": 743,
                "invoice_id": 373,
                "services_name": "Logo Clean Up and Vectorization (HD Logo Drawing)",
                "services_description": "Have you lost your original file for a logo or graphic? Does your logo or graphic have a poor resolution that needs cleaning up? This is the service that can provide you with the perfect result.\n\n- Get a crisp and clean version of your logo for your website, letterhead, emails and more\n- No more fuzzy or pixelated logos which makes your company look unprofessional\n- Get the SOURCE FILE so you can use it and repurpose it however you want \n\nIf you want to redraw other companies' logos for your own features section, this is also the right place! \n\n## **How Does A Crisp and Clean Logo Help Me or My Business?**\nLogos and graphics are some of the first things your customers or clients see online or looking at marketing materials. Clear, precise logos and graphics create a high impact. When your images are not clean, it can make sites or materials look less appealing, or even unauthentic.\n\nSometimes you need to list out where you business has been featured or awards you won. However, the organization's logo is unclear and you want to put up a crisp version of their logo on the website. Then you will need a logo clean up / vectorization / redraw. \n\n## Why Hire RBXServices?\n- High accuracy and attention to detail\n- Incredible speed\n- Whether it's one or twenty, we can handle the volume\n\nThis service includes manual checking and adjustments. We actually check to ensure this is done properly. We will not just run this through a program and send it back. Often, automatic vectorization software is not completely accurate and will require an illustrator to fix certain lines and segments. This is where we come in to make sure the vectorization is done right.\n\n\n## What You Will Get\n- Your logo or graphic converted into a vector SVG format\n- SVG file can be opened by your browser - zero installation needed and completely free\n- SVG file is a standard format that can be opened by many image editors for further editing if needed",
                "services_tier": "Standard|t2",
                "services_image": [
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/3bf1d5aa49c6776d3e63a6a99754c575/142ba348/LogoCleanUpVectorization.png"
                ],
                "services_type": {
                    "title": "Logo With Some Complexity",
                    "price": "8.00",
                    "checklist": [
                        "Logo shapes and text redraw",
                        "Some complexity in shapes and shading",
                        "Perfect vectorized replica",
                        "SVG source file"
                    ],
                    "duration": "3 business days"
                },
                "status": "Pending Details",
                "due_date": null,
                "created_at": 1662054078
            },
            {
                "id": 341,
                "client_id": 2,
                "services_id": 743,
                "invoice_id": 372,
                "services_name": "Logo Clean Up and Vectorization (HD Logo Drawing)",
                "services_description": "Have you lost your original file for a logo or graphic? Does your logo or graphic have a poor resolution that needs cleaning up? This is the service that can provide you with the perfect result.\n\n- Get a crisp and clean version of your logo for your website, letterhead, emails and more\n- No more fuzzy or pixelated logos which makes your company look unprofessional\n- Get the SOURCE FILE so you can use it and repurpose it however you want \n\nIf you want to redraw other companies' logos for your own features section, this is also the right place! \n\n## **How Does A Crisp and Clean Logo Help Me or My Business?**\nLogos and graphics are some of the first things your customers or clients see online or looking at marketing materials. Clear, precise logos and graphics create a high impact. When your images are not clean, it can make sites or materials look less appealing, or even unauthentic.\n\nSometimes you need to list out where you business has been featured or awards you won. However, the organization's logo is unclear and you want to put up a crisp version of their logo on the website. Then you will need a logo clean up / vectorization / redraw. \n\n## Why Hire RBXServices?\n- High accuracy and attention to detail\n- Incredible speed\n- Whether it's one or twenty, we can handle the volume\n\nThis service includes manual checking and adjustments. We actually check to ensure this is done properly. We will not just run this through a program and send it back. Often, automatic vectorization software is not completely accurate and will require an illustrator to fix certain lines and segments. This is where we come in to make sure the vectorization is done right.\n\n\n## What You Will Get\n- Your logo or graphic converted into a vector SVG format\n- SVG file can be opened by your browser - zero installation needed and completely free\n- SVG file is a standard format that can be opened by many image editors for further editing if needed",
                "services_tier": "Standard|t2",
                "services_image": [
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/3bf1d5aa49c6776d3e63a6a99754c575/142ba348/LogoCleanUpVectorization.png"
                ],
                "services_type": {
                    "title": "Logo With Some Complexity",
                    "price": "8.00",
                    "checklist": [
                        "Logo shapes and text redraw",
                        "Some complexity in shapes and shading",
                        "Perfect vectorized replica",
                        "SVG source file"
                    ],
                    "duration": "3 business days"
                },
                "status": "Pending Details",
                "due_date": null,
                "created_at": 1662052538
            },
            {
                "id": 340,
                "client_id": 2,
                "services_id": 742,
                "invoice_id": 355,
                "services_name": "Full Service: Google Ads Text Campaign Setup & Writing",
                "services_description": "Get Your Google ad campaign up and running with our all-in-one package. This includes everything you need to get a professional Google Ads campaign turned on and running.\n\n## **How Does This Help Me or My Business?**\nGoogle ads give your business immediate exposure to potential customers on the Google search results page. With proper targetting, any business can get in front of potential customers, which then results in leads and sales. \n\n## **Why Hire RBXServices?**\nWe have built over 100 profitable Google Ads campaigns that generates a steady stream of leads and sales for businesses. We bring technical know-how, business acumen and a one-stop-shop style solution to the table.\n\n## What Does This Service Include?\nSetup includes:\n- Keyword research\n- Ad copywriting (responsive search ads)\n- Extensions writing - structured snippets, sitelink extensions, callout extensions\n- Account setup \n- Conversion tracking on your website\n\nMaintenance includes:\n- Keyword review and negative keyword maintenance\n- Performance review to spot any issues\n- Identify opportunities to increase sales and leads\n- Regular reporting",
                "services_tier": "Standard|t2",
                "services_image": [
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/2b4081caa5ac9ad712c1e975e11d96a0/ed1b305c/Fullservicegoogleadstextcampaign.png"
                ],
                "services_type": {
                    "title": "Full Setup + 1 Month of Maintenance",
                    "price": "700",
                    "checklist": [
                        "Everything in Basic, plus:",
                        "1 monthly checkups",
                        "Keyword review",
                        "Performance review",
                        "Account maintenance"
                    ],
                    "duration": "5 business days"
                },
                "status": "Pending Details",
                "due_date": null,
                "created_at": 1661942950
            },
            {
                "id": 339,
                "client_id": 2,
                "services_id": 777,
                "invoice_id": 352,
                "services_name": "Pixel Perfect Design Coding: PSD, Sketch, Figma XD to Wordpress Elementor",
                "services_description": "Get your design coded into a fully responsive, pixel perfect Wordpress website!\n\nWe can convert and code all major design formats: Sketch, PSD, Figma, XD, PDF, AI into a Wordpress theme using Elementor Pro. Your website will look very much like your design.\n\nOur team of expert theme coders have coded thousands of pages of design over the past 10 years. We know the in’s and out’s of theme coding and can achieve a level of accuracy few other coders can claim to do.\n\n(Just look at the design vs code comparison above)\n\nPricing is straight forward and counted per page.  \n\n## Here’s What You Will Get\n- A Wordpress website with coded theme\n- Pixel perfect accuracy that looks almost identical to your design\n- Professionally coded website that works well \n- Change text easily. Easy to edit website with Elementor Pro system - point and click \n- Fully mobile responsive - the website will work for desktop, tablet and smartphone\n- 1 free installation to a domain name and hosting company of your choice to hand off the project\n\n## Send Us Your Design - Custom Quote and Discounts\nIf you have any questions, click \"Ask a Question\" and upload your design. We can give you a custom quote for your project.",
                "services_tier": "Standard|t2",
                "services_image": [
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/bd36949baaa161bbf74744705e4fd49e/44949282/SmileGocomparison.png",
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/4ed2b8567bae87a3ce3fd75696b3635e/b6e6e192/SupremePixelPerfectExample.png",
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/bb35e183ace66503b33ad599c6cc1d6c/42fad7b8/SmileGodesign.png",
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/584c606ed01f784b2dd6b268d41f7181/bd433ea3/SmileGoweb.png"
                ],
                "services_type": {
                    "title": "Code 2 pages in Wordpress",
                    "price": "350",
                    "checklist": [
                        "Wordpress Website Coding to Elementor Pro",
                        "2 Page Design",
                        "Use Elementor Pro",
                        "Pixel Perfect Accuracy",
                        "3 Responsive Modes - Desktop, Tablet, Mobile"
                    ],
                    "duration": "7 days"
                },
                "status": "Pending Details",
                "due_date": null,
                "created_at": 1661835274
            },
            {
                "id": 336,
                "client_id": 2,
                "services_id": 742,
                "invoice_id": 333,
                "services_name": "Full Service: Google Ads Text Campaign Setup & Writing",
                "services_description": "Get Your Google ad campaign up and running with our all-in-one package. This includes everything you need to get a professional Google Ads campaign turned on and running.\n\n## **How Does This Help Me or My Business?**\nGoogle ads give your business immediate exposure to potential customers on the Google search results page. With proper targetting, any business can get in front of potential customers, which then results in leads and sales. \n\n## **Why Hire RBXServices?**\nWe have built over 100 profitable Google Ads campaigns that generates a steady stream of leads and sales for businesses. We bring technical know-how, business acumen and a one-stop-shop style solution to the table.\n\n## What Does This Service Include?\nSetup includes:\n- Keyword research\n- Ad copywriting (responsive search ads)\n- Extensions writing - structured snippets, sitelink extensions, callout extensions\n- Account setup \n- Conversion tracking on your website\n\nMaintenance includes:\n- Keyword review and negative keyword maintenance\n- Performance review to spot any issues\n- Identify opportunities to increase sales and leads\n- Regular reporting",
                "services_tier": "Basic|t1",
                "services_image": [
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/2b4081caa5ac9ad712c1e975e11d96a0/ed1b305c/Fullservicegoogleadstextcampaign.png"

We bring technical know-how, business acumen and a one-stop-shop style solution to the table.\n\n## What Does This Service Include?\nSetup includes:\n- Keyword research\n- Ad copywriting (responsive search ads)\n- Extensions writing - structured snippets, sitelink extensions, callout extensions\n- Account setup \n- Conversion tracking on your website\n\nMaintenance includes:\n- Keyword review and negative keyword maintenance\n- Performance review to spot any issues\n- Identify opportunities to increase sales and leads\n- Regular reporting",

                "services_image": [

            {
                "id": 316,
                "client_id": 2,
                "services_id": 746,
                "invoice_id": 300,
                "services_name": "Setup Multi-store Locator Map in Wordpress",
                "services_description": "We will create a fully integrated and interactive Google Maps Store Locator for your WordPress business website. You can update locations manually as and when necessary as your business grows. If you have many locations, we can also sync from Google Spreadsheet or Airtable to Google Maps.\n\n## **How Does This Help Me or My Business?**\nFor businesses with multiple locations or franchisees: We make it easy for your customers to find you and your business in the most convenient way. By locating their nearest location at the top of the search they know exactly where you are and how accessible it is to reach your services or products. We can use GPS to retrieve user location and adjust the map automatically.\n\nFor dealer locator or “where to find my products”: Are you a business with products sold physically through various retail stores? You would definitely want to tell your customers where they can buy your products in-store. You can load hundreds or thousands of retailers into the map. Based on the user’s location, we can show the retailers close by where the user can find and buy your products.\n\n\n## **Why Hire RBXExperts?**\nBecause we have done many maps before! Our team of experts understands the value of having your business visible in the most convenient way for your customers searching for your product or service. This one-time investment gives you flexibility for updating yourself as you grow. We can add new locations as you go. And best of all, you can make these edits yourself - there is no coding involved.\n\n## **What You Will Get**\n- Google Maps integration\n- Search for the nearest location with real-time directions\n- Search for store locations by Address/Postcode\n- Admin panel for new store configuration\n- Map marker choice\n- Full business details\n\n## **How to Get Your Store Locator Map in 4 Simple Steps**\n- Choose a color style or theme\n- Give us a spreadsheet or locations\n- Deploy the map code on your website\n- Your map is ready for use!",
                "services_tier": "Standard|t2",
                "services_image": [
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/4dbeaafbae88ed354fa88320ebcdd063/6a926204/SetupMulti-storeLocatorMapinWordpress.png"

            {
                "id": 309,
                "client_id": 2,
                "services_id": 744,
                "invoice_id": 283,
                "services_name": "Full Service: Woocommerce Google Shopping Ad Campaign Setup",
                "services_description": "Get Your Google Shopping Ads campaign up and running with our all-in-one package. \n\nWe will sync up your Woocommerce Cart to the Google Shopping Ads campaign **automatically**, so your products will get listed in Google Shopping.\n\nWith our service, you do not need to manually upload your products to Google Ads! Once you add products into your store, the image, prices and product names will show up on google AUTOMATICALLY!\n\n## **How Does This Help Me or My Business?**\nShoppers nowadays start their shopping and research journey on Google. Listing your product inventory automatically on Google will give you direct exposure to the customer, and a huge advantage over your competition.\n\nWith proper targeting, your ecommerce store can get in front of potential customers, which then results in leads and sales. \n\n\n## **Why Hire RBXServices?**\nWe are highly experienced with syncing up Woocommerce with Google Shopping Ads. We understand the pitfalls along the way and can help you get approved to list products on Google Shopping.\n\nWe have built over 100 profitable Google Ads campaigns that generates a steady stream of leads and sales for businesses. We bring technical know-how, business acumen and a one-stop-shop style solution to the table.\n\n## What Does This Service Include?\nSetup includes:\n- Woocommerce installation assessment - make sure your site can handle\n- Google Shopping Campaign setup\n- Google Ads account setup (if you do not have one already)\n- 1 headline, 2 description lines ad copywriting\n- Google Shopping Approval process guidance - your campaign will be reviewed by Google. We will try our best to get it approved\n- This is a turnkey service - sit back and we will do most of the work\n- **Your own** Google Ads account that you control\n\n## What Restrictions Are There?\n- Woocommerce installs that are heavily customized\n- Websites that sells items prohibited by Google Ads, such as:\n    - regulated drugs, pharmaceuticals, weapons, counterfeit items, etc.\n- Services (non-physical products)\n    - these cannot be listed on Google Shopping ads\n- Non-woocommerce ecommerce shops (Sorry we only support Woocommerce at this point)\n\nDo not worry - just contact us and we will take a look to tell you if this is suitable with your Woocommerce shop\n\n## Process and Timing\n- We will get started shortly after your order, but please note Google needs 1-2 weeks to review your Shopping Ads application\n- If there is any issue where they require some adjustment, then they would require nother 1-2 weeks for a second review\n- This is out of our control, but we will work as quickly as possible",
                "services_tier": "Standard|t2",
                "services_image": [
                    "https://dl.airtable.com/.attachments/c42d2f5379a2a11d95d0da1711584b39/750b264e/GoogleShoppingforWoocommerce.png"
                ],
                "services_type": {
                    "title": "Woocommerce Google Shopping Ads",
                    "price": "400",

                        "Up to 2000 products",

                        "Google Shopping ads approval guidance"
                    ],
                    "duration": "6 business days"

            {
                "id": 308,
                "client_id": 2,
                "services_id": 749,
                "invoice_id": 280,
                "services_name": "Increase Wordpress Website Speed / Fix Slow Website Problem",
                "services_description": "We offer a FREE ASSESSMENT for Wordpress website speed issues. Send us a message us with your website's URL and we will make sure:\n- we can speed up your site\n- you get the correct package  \n- communicate with you the type of changes done beforehand.\n\n**Please inquire first before purchasing service!**\n\nDid you know that if your website is slow-loading, it can make users leave your website and lower your Google rankings? Speed matters. User attention span is short and expect pages to load fast. Search engines tend to recommend sites that are least likely to frustrate their users. It’s not beneficial for your site or the Search Engine’s reputation! This service can remedy the problem.\n\n## **How Does a Fast Website Help My Business?**\nA rapid loading website is key to keeping customer engagement. When pages hang or take too long to load it creates frustration and is likely to increase your bounce rate. This is not good for business. Having a fast site that is fully optimized will also ensure Search Engines are ranking you the highest you can for that parameter. Rankings mean more clicks and improved sales potential.\n\n## **Why Hire RBXServices?**\nThis service is under our “no fix no pay” policy. If we cannot make your website faster, we will refund you the payment. In addition, our optimization will not impact the functionality or looks of your site, which can often happen with less experienced developers who charge much less. \n\n## **What You Will Get**\n- Reduced server wait time: time required for server to load the page\n- Reduced page loading time for user: time required for user’s device to load the page\n- Proper configuration of browser caching for static assets, such as images\n- Excellent performance during high traffic hours\n\n## **Action/Process**\nPlease send us the URL for the website you wish to optimize before purchasing so we can recommend the right package.",

            {

                "services_id": 757,
                "invoice_id": 281,
                "services_name": "Maintenance & Check Up For Your Google Text Ads Campaign",
                "services_description": "If you’re new to Google Ads and need some help, we’re here for you. We can maintain and do thorough, routine checkups on your campaigns to ensure they are optimized. Marketing means money being spent, and we can make sure your budget, however large or small, is getting you the most for your business.\n\n## **How Does This Help Me or My Business?**\nProfitable leads are what drive business growth. We can help you target the right audience for your Google Ads and maximize your sales potential.\n\nAny ad campaign will need regular checkout to make sure it is targeting the right traffic and working as intended.\n\n## **Why Hire RBX Experts?**\nAds need to use the right keywords for optimal results and we can deliver that. Our highly experienced team can offer campaign setup and creation if you already have some experience yourself. Or, we can manage your campaign for you for the desired length of time.\n\n## **What You Will Get**\nYou will receive the following to improve your Google Text Ads campaign:\n- Evaluation of your ads campaign structure and whether any change is needed\n- Negative keywords recommendation\n- Bidding strategy\n- Review of all Google recommendations and only allow appropriate ones\n- Review key settings:\n    - Targeted locations\n    - Language\n    - Hours\n- Identification of places to increase spend or cut back \n\n## **Process**\n- Provide us with your website \n- Provide us with your ad account ID\n- We will do a review and send back a recommendation report\n\n##",
                "services_tier": "Standard|t2",
                "services_image": [

                "services_name": "Setup Custom Style Google Map in Wordpress",
                "services_description": "Does your website need an interactive & searchable map that highlights different landmarks (locally or across larger geographical areas)? We can create beautifully interactive maps that are fully customizable, responsive, and can integrate into WordPress websites.\n\n## **How Does This Help Me or My Business?**\nA custom-style Google Map can be utilized to highlight the landmarks or amenities you are trying to show to your reader. Examples of usage:\n- Tourist landmarks and locations\n- Multi-store locations for your business\n- Amenities map to showcase services in an area\n- Any reason why you would want to show many landmarks on a map\n\n\n\n## **What You Will Get**\n- Google Maps integration\n- Search for the nearest location with real-time directions\n- Search for store locations by Address/Postcode\n- Admin panel for new store configuration\n- Map marker choice\n- Full business details\n- Connection to Google Sheets / Airtable for real-time updates\n\n## **Fully Compatible with All Websites / Ecom Systems**\n- Map code that can be used on any website\n- Wordpress, Shopify, Squarespace, Wix, Webly, Webflow, etc. are all supported\n- Very easy to deploy, just copy and paste a 1 line code and the map can start running\n- Map is fully responsive - will work on PC and Mobile",

            {
                "id": 305,
                "client_id": 2,
                "services_id": 743,
                "invoice_id": 278,
                "services_name": "Logo Clean Up and Vectorization (HD Logo Drawing)",
                "services_description": "Have you lost your original file for a logo or graphic? Does your logo or graphic have a poor resolution that needs cleaning up? This is the service that can provide you with the perfect result.\n\n- Get a crisp and clean version of your logo for your website, letterhead, emails and more\n- No more fuzzy or pixelated logos which makes your company look unprofessional\n- Get the SOURCE FILE so you can use it and repurpose it however you want \n\nIf you want to redraw other companies' logos for your own features section, this is also the right place! \n\n## **How Does A Crisp and Clean Logo Help Me or My Business?**\nLogos and graphics are some of the first things your customers or clients see online or looking at marketing materials. Clear, precise logos and graphics create a high impact. When your images are not clean, it can make sites or materials look less appealing, or even unauthentic.\n\nSometimes you need to list out where you business has been featured or awards you won. However, the organization's logo is unclear and you want to put up a crisp version of their logo on the website. Then you will need a logo clean up / vectorization / redraw. \n\n## Why Hire RBXServices?\n- High accuracy and attention to detail\n- Incredible speed\n- Whether it's one or twenty, we can handle the volume\n\nThis service includes manual checking and adjustments. We actually check to ensure this is done properly. We will not just run this through a program and send it back. Often, automatic vectorization software is not completely accurate and will require an illustrator to fix certain lines and segments. This is where we come in to make sure the vectorization is done right.\n\n\n## What You Will Get\n- Your logo or graphic converted into a vector SVG format\n- SVG file can be opened by your browser - zero installation needed and completely free\n- SVG file is a standard format that can be opened by many image editors for further editing if needed",
                "services_tier": "Standard|t2",
                "services_image": [

                "services_name": "Setup Multi-store Locator Map in Wordpress",
                "services_description": "We will create a fully integrated and interactive Google Maps Store Locator for your WordPress business website. You can update locations manually as and when necessary as your business grows. If you have many locations, we can also sync from Google Spreadsheet or Airtable to Google Maps.\n\n## **How Does This Help Me or My Business?**\nFor businesses with multiple locations or franchisees: We make it easy for your customers to find you and your business in the most convenient way. By locating their nearest location at the top of the search they know exactly where you are and how accessible it is to reach your services or products. We can use GPS to retrieve user location and adjust the map automatically.\n\nFor dealer locator or “where to find my products”: Are you a business with products sold physically through various retail stores? You would definitely want to tell your customers where they can buy your products in-store. You can load hundreds or thousands of retailers into the map. Based on the user’s location, we can show the retailers close by where the user can find and buy your products.\n\n\n## **Why Hire RBXExperts?**\nBecause we have done many maps before! Our team of experts understands the value of having your business visible in the most convenient way for your customers searching for your product or service. This one-time investment gives you flexibility for updating yourself as you grow. We can add new locations as you go. And best of all, you can make these edits yourself - there is no coding involved.\n\n## **What You Will Get**\n- Google Maps integration\n- Search for the nearest location with real-time directions\n- Search for store locations by Address/Postcode\n- Admin panel for new store configuration\n- Map marker choice\n- Full business details\n\n## **How to Get Your Store Locator Map in 4 Simple Steps**\n- Choose a color style or theme\n- Give us a spreadsheet or locations\n- Deploy the map code on your website\n- Your map is ready for use!",
